help.quickstart.title: Quick start
help.qs.2: Click Search. Results appear in the table.

help.apikey.title: API key
help.apikey.desc: Stored server-side in .env as GOOGLE_API_KEY. Never sent to the browser.
help.tips.title: Tips
help.tips.1: Queries compose as ‚Äúsector + keyword + neighborhood + district + city + country‚Äù.
help.tips.2: If results are too broad, add city/district or refine keyword.
help.tips.3: REQUEST_DENIED: check billing and key restrictions.
